info.title: The Red Alliance API
info.description: An API to submit and retrieve data for and from The Red Alliance family of products.

post.description: Allows currently authenticated (via Google OAuth) users to create API keys to access the API programatically.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: FRC team number of the team that the user belongs to.

200.description: The API key was created. Returns the issued client ID, client secret, and team with which the key is registered.

400.description: The API key was not created. Returns the reasons the API key was not created.

401.description: The current user is not authorized to perform this action.

403.description: Key-based authentication is not allowed for this route

post.summary: Add current user as scouter to a match
post.description: Registers the currently signed-in user as the scouter for a given match and a team at a given competition.

parameters.name: team_scouting
parameters.description: FRC team number of the team that the scouter is scouting.

parameters.name: competition
parameters.description: FRC competition code at which the user is scouting.

200.description: The user was added as a scouter to the match.

400.description: The user was not added as a scouter to the match. Returns the reasons for the error.

401.description: The current user is not authorized to perform this action.

403.description: Key-based authentication is not allowed for this route

post.description: Stores that the currently signed-in user is a member of the given team.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: FRC team number of the team that the scouter belongs to.

200.description: The user was added to the team. Returns the name, Google ID, and team of the newly-registered user.

400.description: The user was not added to the team. Returns the reasons for the error.

401.description: The current user is not authorized to perform this action.

403.description: Key-based authentication is not allowed for this route

get.description: Returns the name, Google ID, and team number for the currently authenticated user.

200.description: The user was added to the team. Returns the name, Google ID, and team of the user.

400.description: The user team association could not be retrieved. Returns the reason for the error.

401.description: The current user is not authorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Remove current user as scouter to a match
post.description: Removes the currently signed-in user as a scouter for a given match and team at a given competition.

200.description: The user was removed as a scouter to the match.

400.description: The user was not removed as a scouter to the match. Returns the reasons for the error.

401.description: The current user is not authorized to perform this action.

403.description: Key-based authentication is not allowed for this route

post.description: Stores the scouted match data for a given match and team.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Match data of arbitrary JSON structure to store.

200.description: The data was submitted. Returns the comeptition and match that was scouted.

400.description: The data was not submitted. Returns the reasons for the error.

401.description: The current user is not authorized to perform this action.
